pages.text: Hiveheart, the enigmatic two-handed hammer, appears as though a wild beehive has affixed itself to a hilt. For reasons unknown, the hive's inhabitants seem to be bound in servitude to the wielder, attacking enemies on sight.

The swarm's allegiance extends beyond mere offensive might. At the wielder's behest, the bees produce a regenerative honeyâ€”a miraculous nectar with the capability to heal even the most grievous of wounds.
